val:
For the complete history of stoicism - I made a separate website for it. But what I was able to do with stoicism is the main part of this blog post.

Stoicism. I first encountered this way of thinking from Tim Ferris author of Tools for titans and 4HWWK and he explains it as his operating system. It is really an operating system much better than anything I’ve come across - believe me I’ve studied everything.
